Articles.Content:
Hello one and all.

I have only just been introduced to KSP (by my 10 year old) and I am already spending way too much time Kerballing A great way to relax on an evening. Not being a rocket builder or mathematician I am heavily dependent on MechJeb (perfect tools for 3 finger counters like me) though with help form the tutorials I have placed some ships into Kerbin orbit manually. Crashes not withstanding I am having a ball.

See you out there people

Welcome aboard, and welcome to your new life, or lack there of.

It'll be fun!

helo a chroeso!

Living in Cardiff myself and you've just lost all hope of free time or concentrating in work. I keep having these flashes of rockets in my head and new ideas for stuff to build and losing my train of thought. I would marry this game.

Anyway, good luck and have fun.

Hello John.E, Greetings from Cardiff!

@Monkeh Cardiff Space Program!
